name: Last marathon
description:
Hi guys, this is a little project that I have done, and I really liked to make it, so here it is. 

Intro

You play as a  man that went for a run to do some exercise in a jungle near his home.  But this is not a normal day in the forest,  since every creature there wants to chase you and the only option you have is to run.  You know you are going to be safe when you get home, so avoid the evil and survive till you enter in your house. 

Controls

Just space to jump and double jump.

Have fun!
